description: Remove Android support and verify all projects build with migrated APIs
context: OpenTraceCapture built successfully and installed to /tmp/opentrace-install
OpenTraceDecode built successfully with minor warning and installed to /tmp/opentrace-install
OpenTraceCLI built successfully using new headers from /tmp/opentrace-install

Build verification complete with notes: OpenTraceCapture builds successfully (with C++ bindings), OpenTraceDecode builds successfully, OpenTraceCLI builds successfully. OpenTraceView has header path issues due to C++ bindings pkg-config not being installed - this is a packaging issue not an API migration issue. The API prefixes (otc_, otd_) are correctly used throughout all projects.
Fixed C++ bindings pkg-config file to point to correct include directory. OpenTraceView now builds successfully - 94MB binary created at buildtest/opentraceview
